alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:07PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Harding County through 845 PM MDT... At 807 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from South Cave Hills to 6 miles southwest of Lake Gardner to 12 miles east of Ridgeway. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... South Cave Hills around 815 PM MDT. Lake Gardner around 820 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Buffalo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
